English: in a job, it is normal and natural for there to be a conflict between personal and work interests because we humans definitely have limitations, which of course may touch on personal and work. to deal with this, what is important to me is how we respond to this situation, we need calm and patience to don't be carried away by emotions and passions that ultimately make the wrong choice, and if necessary, maybe we can ask for advice and input from other people, be it colleagues or our leaders. for personal interests, sometimes there are things we can put aside while there is still time to do so unless that is very important and cannot be abandoned, for example our parents are sick and we are the only child nearby then we can ask the leadership for permission regarding this matter and i am sure the leadership will also understand if we face this. furthermore, for the sake of work, we must be able to share which ones must be done by us and which ones can be delegated to our colleagues so that work interests can be fulfilled and do not conflict with personal interests
Summaries: in a job, it is normal for there to be a conflict between personal and work interests.

English: in 2009, while serving at the regional secretariat, the application of compliance with rules and norms among co-workers or organizations was sometimes still not optimal. this happened as an example of discipline when entering work and we often see that there are employees who are diligent in coming to work on time and following the morning assembly, but there are also employees who are less diligent in coming to work on time and rarely attend the morning assembly. however, the attitudes and actions taken by the leadership sometimes don't care because they prioritize the important work. finished responding to this for me is how i try to always follow the rules and norms well so that i can set an example for others. to reprimand others is not always done with words but with our attitude and behavior which strives to be better, maybe that can provide encouragement for other people to change, but sometimes a word is needed if something can no longer be tolerated, perhaps it is also necessary to convey suggestions and input to the leadership in the right way and at the right time so that our suggestions and input can be accepted
